title: UP International Trade Show turns hotels into hotspots with 50% booking surge
description: The Uttar Pradesh International Trade Show (UPITS) concluded successfully, benefiting exhibitors and the hotel industry in Greater Noida. The five-day event led to a significant increase in hotel bookings and provided good business opportunities for participants. Entrepreneurs reported securing orders from both domestic and international buyers, enhancing trade and tourism in the state.
